attributes.action: All products using non-recyclable packaging have to be visibly labeled as such.
attributes.additional_details: This would encourage manufacturers and shops to use alternative or even non-packaging solutions (for fruit and veg for instance) for fear of losing sales to similar products that don't have these warning labels.
attributes.background: In the same way as cigarettes are labelled for their health risks, all products using nonrecyclable packaging have to be visibly labelled to enable consumers to make informed choices: 'This Product Uses Non-Recyclable Packaging'.
